Name: Add-BitLockerKeyProtector
Synopsis: Adds a key protector for a BitLocker volume.

Name: Backup-BitLockerKeyProtector
Synopsis: Saves a key protector for a BitLocker volume in AD DS.

Name: Disable-BitLocker
Synopsis: Disables BitLocker encryption for a volume.

Name: Disable-BitLockerAutoUnlock
Synopsis: Disables automatic unlocking for a BitLocker volume.

Name: Enable-BitLocker
Synopsis: Enables encryption for a BitLocker volume.

Name: Enable-BitLockerAutoUnlock
Synopsis: Enables automatic unlocking for a BitLocker volume.

Name: Get-BitLockerVolume
Synopsis: Gets information about volumes that BitLocker can protect.

Name: Lock-BitLocker
Synopsis: Prevents access to encrypted data on a BitLocker volume.

Name: Remove-BitLockerKeyProtector
Synopsis: Removes a key protector for a BitLocker volume.

Name: Resume-BitLocker
Synopsis: Restores Bitlocker encryption for the specified volume.

Name: Suspend-BitLocker
Synopsis: Suspends Bitlocker encryption for the specified volume.

Name: Unlock-BitLocker
Synopsis: Restores access to data on a BitLocker volume.
